metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000115 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Mercurial prior to version 4.3 is vulnerable to a missing symlink checkthat can malicious repositories to modify files outside the repository

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 2.8.2-1ubuntu1.4
mercurial-common - 2.8.2-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mercurial package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8.2-1ubuntu1.4').
